nodes.text: Ellylyn was a slaver and commentator on Gundark's Gear Datalog during the early years of the New Republic. Ellylyn carried neuronic whip while overseeing slaves and saw it as a symbol of authority. When Ellylyn put it down for a moment, a runaway attempted to shoot the slaver. Ellylyn related the story to Lowwel on the entry for the neuronic whip in Gundark's Gear Datalog when Lowwel stated that the whip was a cruel weapon and the users were evil.
